storyInfo: The Tin Man is ambushed. The Doctor falls into a trap. Jara is under pressure. A wind brushes across Silence's face, she turns around, and no longer wants to run away.

attributes.content: Hmm... the usual stench of the sewers, and spots where the light doesn't reach.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: These alleys are all the same.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Urban planners probably can't afford to invent new ways to do their jobs at the speed these cities pop up out of the barrenlands.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: It's just too bad that you miss out on the local scenery if you use these nooks and crannies too much.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Am I right, my good subordinate? Isn't it better to get a view of the city from above?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: A gust of wind blows through the empty alley.
All the un-exhaled smoke rings swirl back into the cracks in his metal. The Tin Man wonders if this is an opportune time to hack a few coughs as if choking.
A lighter floats right in front of him as soon as the embers of his cigarette die out.
'Banal' is such a lamentable assessment for a city like this with no history.
...Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You were supposed to make contact three days ago.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Oh? I had the impression that you're not particularly punctual yourself.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: If you could just tone down your volume. Why did you pick this place for our meeting?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Did you forget? The factory in District 13 is close by.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Did you find the item from the other day?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Yes, but unfortunately there are only fragments left. Fragments of... stars, with no way to guide the lost.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: And Kristen? Where is she?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Are you watching the sky?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You get a clearer view of the sky without the skyscrapers around.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Do you think Kristen might be hiding in a star up there? If so, then how are we supposed to find her?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak, you went into the library two months ago.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I'm a historian, isn't it basically my job to visit libraries?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: We're talking about Maylander's 'library' here.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I don't recall authorizing that.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You know I can't contain my curiosity.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Just like right now...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: If I could trouble my employer with... a question that I've been awfully curious about...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Your smoke.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Other than the clouds you puff out, the few wisps that slip into your body... where exactly do they go?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Is this why... you have the tip of your tail on my chest?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I smell my favorite scent on you... history.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: So if it's at all possible, I'd love to get a good look at every little piece of your body for my research... Where should I start? Your head? Chest? Extremities?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: ...Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Do you really think... betraying the Maylander Foundation is the right choice here?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Of course... not.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Maylander holds most of this country's secrets. And in Columbia, secrets can be traded for wealth... or used as murder weapons.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I spent three whole years before I finally managed to get into the Historical Society, and spent another three to gain your trust.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Do you know what six years means to me? Being a Maylander agent has already taken... one-seventh of my life.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Then you shouldn't be wasting the rest of it behind bars or on the run.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Yes, yes... I know.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: And yet... if my time here isn't enough to embrace what I've been yearning for my whole life, then what difference does it make if I live another ten years or one more minute?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Maylander won't allow anyone, least of all a defected agent, to access information they shouldn't be accessing.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: A shame you only have me to see in your last moments.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Then I can only pray to the stars... that the dead won't speak so easily.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Fine, let me switch up the question—
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: —Do you really think you can kill me?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I'll never know... until I try.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Hrgh— Huh?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Your air manipulation shouldn't be affecting me... no, this isn't a K'uk'ulkan ability at all.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You know me just so well, don't you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: But, fortunately, I'm not exactly completely clueless as to what you are. Ordinary Arts have no effect on you, but...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: ...A curse.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: The power of the oldest Sarkaz witchcraft, a soul-imprisoning curse.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: It's been an awfully long time since you've had a taste of something like this, hmm?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: That one year when a Maylander agent went deep into the Bleached Wasteland to investigate the ruins of the Sarkaz Royal Court, and suffered an unprecedented, life-threatening injury—
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I didn't expect Maylander to leave those files intact.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You can't have thought that I ventured into Maylander's top secret database just for Kristen?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I did remind him that documenting everything isn't necessarily a good habit to have, all the time.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Hmph... According to you, only the long-lived would have such an extensive memory, while the rest of us just want to grab as much knowledge as we can, so naturally come up with different methods.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Otherwise, how could we short-lived beings hope to resist the control of people like you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Huff... hah...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: If you really want to destroy this body, you probably need a little more time.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I have two minutes to spare.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: So, you're not even going to come out of hiding to greet me...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: ...Banshee?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Weren't you just talking about how unwilling you are to show yourself?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Like I said, I have no interest in watching you murder your own boss.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: But he's more than just that.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Oh? Old acquaintances, are you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Personally? Not at all.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: But my blood knows him.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Fascinating. I've been over it many times, and this guy here... doesn't smell Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Be careful of any tricks he might play. I don't want him to resurrect right after all the trouble I've gone through to kill him.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I won't let him interfere with the next step of the plan.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Hmm... I can't do it.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: A delicate trap you've laid. I had guessed that Ho'olheyak might have planted something in the sky, but I didn't expect a banshee's curse to be hidden in the noise of the construction site.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: My blood has taught me the power of words, and the sound of machinery clashing and colliding is the language I hear most.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: An amazing talent to have fooled even me. There are only a few banshees, including those in the Royal Court, who could make me suffer like this.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Were you born in Kazdel, or the Valley of the Banshees?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: It doesn't matter. My blood is not pure enough, and I haven't experienced any grand events either.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Right now, I'm just a engineer living in Columbia doing whatever I want.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: *cough*...haha... have you found a home... in Columbia?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Ah... so many years have passed by in a flash.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I've heard, that over the past two centuries, those two youths... Theresis and Theresa have finally built Kazdel as a Nomadic city.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I don't even know myself what Kazdel looks like today.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Are the streets still as crowded, the flags hanging on the city walls unchanged for a millennium, the undying furnace in the core still as hot as ever?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Can you relight my cigarette, child?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: This little spark can't hold the remaining warmth of your soul.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I know. I only... want to stay a little longer to ask you a few more questions.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: What did you see, in Kristen's dreams?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: ...The future.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Has she actually promised you... a change to the Sarkaz's fate? Do you believe she can do what no one has been able to accomplish over the past millennium?
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: No, she only showed me a possibility.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: A possibility... that came from within myself.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Alright, Engineer Girl, if I could just trouble you to ask my darling employer if he has any last words?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The fire is almost out.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Time moves too fast for an old man like me.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: The last question is mine.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: An ancient one like you must have seen the fall of many Kazdels, and surely you must have thought of and searched for a place—
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: (Speaks in Sarkaz) Where is the Sarkaz promised land?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Promised... land, hm...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Time's up.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: A silvery green tail shatters the Tin Man's sigh with a strong burst of wind.
The last spark fizzles out at the same time the cigarette hits the ground.
A bone whistle sounds.
Trimounts has never heard such a sound. Neither the residents in their deep sleep or the office workers working overtime will be aware of what has just happened.
Other than those who've made an appointment.
Huh?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Logos was too busy to come to Trimounts, right?

attributes.content: My terminal says Logos has a lot to do. He hasn't trained with me for a long time, so I haven't been using my full strength in my sessions.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Don't make things hard for Mechanist.;It's been hard for Blaze and Sharp.

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: My devices are like the Rhodes Island cabins, if they break down, it takes a long time for Mechanist and Closure to fix them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Blaze and Sharp always complain that training with me is more tiring than going out on missions.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Before we left the landship, Radian told me that Logos would come back with Amiya soon.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I miss Amiya too. I miss her so much.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, will we be able to see them, after we finish this, and return to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: I miss them too.;I hope we can see them soon too.

attributes.content: Doctor, did you make it there?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Yes, the message says we're meeting in this alley.;I think the Tin Man should be already waiting for me?
We'll go home soon, I promise.

attributes.content: The alley is dark and silent, like an abyss.
Something rolls out from the murky shadows.
Perhaps it's due to its material hardness, but as it rubs against the ground, it eerily resembles a cog out of its wheel, a frightful rattle echoing through the darkness of the night.
It rolls straight to the alley entrance, where light and darkness meet.
It turns out to be a metal head.

The upper half is usually obscured by a hat's brim, and the mouth on its lower half often has a cigarette exhaling rings of smoke while spouting words that are at times perceptive, and other times incongruous.
But now there is no cigarette, no hat, no trench coat, or even the part that should be present past the neck.
There is only a head.
I would take it easy, if I were you.
After all, if you do make any moves, I can't guarantee that your head won't end up rolling along with my old employer's there.

attributes.options: Let's get to the point.;You didn't come here just to banter with me.

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Two things—It's time for Rhodes Island to end your excursion in Trimounts, and the other, as you've just seen, the leader of the Maylander agents, the 'Tin Man' has been murdered. We need a culprit.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.options: And you've picked me.;Should I feel honored?

attributes.content: Your frailty certainly affects the credibility of the idea.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: But the mundanity and perfectly enigmatic vibes of Rhodes Island makes you an excellent target for Maylander investigations, even if just for a bit.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.options: You want to buy Kristen some time.;You want to buy yourself some time.

attributes.content: It won't do you any good to look for other secrets, okay?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.options: It's not like I can run.;It never hurts to get a better understanding of each other.

attributes.content: Are you going to try and call for help?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You might want to lower your gaze, my tail won't exactly agree.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Or do you want to employ your expert negotiation techniques, to list a number of reasons why I can't do anything to you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What a pity that Trimounts is not Tkaronto, and your opponent is not some black-hearted pharma.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I've had my eyes on you ever since you stepped into Trimounts.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: At first, none of this had anything to do with you... or Rhodes Island at all.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Even if you and Saria are moving in the same direction, roleplaying as heroic firefighters, why haven't you dispatched a few more men like that good old mechanic to mop things up quick?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: If you're not going to talk, then why don't I... tear your chest open and take a look at the secrets hiding inside?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The silvery green Liberi approaches.
Her plumage scrapes the fabric of your hood, emanating a soft but piercing sound.
At first, I thought you were the same as those other eccentric scientists, trying to find some sort of revelation about the future in Kristen's research.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: After all, we're such a silly species, aren't we? Limited lifespan and unlimited ambition.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The moment we realize the limits of what we can accomplish in our short lives, we become willing to surrender our arrogance for just a moment, and beg for a shortcut.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: But on you...*sniff*...I smell no trace of that desire.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What do you dream of, and what of your past?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm becoming very interested in you now, 'Doctor.'
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: But unfortunately, my colleagues are about to show.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Hold your friend's head in your hands, and enjoy a captivating session with Columbia's top agents. You might find yourself astonished.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Think through some answers to my questions during your interrogation.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.options: I hope I don't give you the chance to run.

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Why... are you here?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Heehee... did this hood ever come with a guarantee of who would be under it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse?

attributes.content: ...A water clone.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Grrr. Any more tricks up your sleeve, pathetic Elf?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island... we will see each other very soon.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Doctor, there are a lot of people rushing towards that alley.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: They're Maylander agents.;Rhodes Island has been set up.

attributes.content: It's a good thing you used your brains and 'borrowed' my clone for that meeting, otherwise you'd have fallen into that horrible woman's trap for real.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: She's definitely left evidence implicating Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: You heard everything she said over the comms, right? Did we make enemies of both Maylander and the military?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ah... hahaha... you're not joking, are you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, if you and the Tin Man had any plans, now would a good time to share them, you know?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your silence implies... Wait, Doctor, you can't mean that he...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Something really happened to that mega mysterious super agent in the trench coat with a tin can for a head?!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I heard a banshee's bone whistle.;The knell has tolled for him.

attributes.content: That was a bone whistle?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wait, banshee, you say? Of the Sarkaz variety?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Was it for Kristen? Did she...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Muelsyse suddenly falls silent. She looks up at the sky above Trimounts.
There is nothing up there besides thousands of stars.
You cannot help but recall Ho'olheyak's question from earlier.
Why did you come to Trimounts?

attributes.options: Kristen... What sort of person is she exactly?;What exactly is the dream that she's chasing?

attributes.content: Quick, Silence! Over here!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This alarm... did something happen to Director Jara...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, are you okay?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm fine. Saria...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'll help you carry her.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Your face is all sweaty, if Saria doesn't wake up now, they're gonna catch us!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't push the blame onto Saria.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But your face... you look like you're about to...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm fine, Ifrit. I just happened to remember what happened earlier.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I watched her fall in front of me, and my very first reaction was not worry, or surprise, but regret.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Because... you were mad at her?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes. If that really was the last conversation we ever had, I didn't want to think... that I was blaming her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Actually I've never... I just...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't know who else can hear me out.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Then just patch things up.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And then, when Saria wakes up, we can go back together. How about it?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She'll return here the moment she wakes up.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's the sort of woman she is.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Fine, I think I get it, neither of you is gonna go home, are you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Then, why not work together?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Work together...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yeah, Silence. Even though you got some new gear on, you're still a doctor. If you keep on running like this, you're gonna get hurt or even die.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I know Saria is a great fighter. Even I've started to know that teamwork's important, yet she still likes to work alone.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If it weren't for us, Saria would be in an even worse situation right now!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Neither of you wanted me to tag along, but at the very least, you gotta promise me that you'll work with Saria.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Otherwise, the two of you will worry about me, and I'll worry about you guys too!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Ifrit.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Just say yes or no. I'll even behave and go back to the Doctor. Just promise me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Some words are easier to say when you're a team, right?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Where did you learn all this?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The Doctor passed taught me all these people skills!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Great!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Uh, Silence, what's that over there?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: A Transmitter... that just appeared?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's all silvery and flowy. Real pretty!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't touch it!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit, that's... very dangerous.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dangerous? No way, more than my flames?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's another product of Rhine's experiments.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: For real? Then I'll burn it up!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No, just wait and see. Don't be too quick to destroy it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A small lump of silvery substance gushes inside the test tube.
Ever since it left Parvis's home, it has lingered without a target direction, as if it has lost its hub directive.
As if its only mission is to lead her to Parvis.
Profess... Parvis never does anything without purpose.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: His appearance earlier, couldn't have just been him wanting to chat with me... he deliberately led me to think he was the goal in this race for the Transmitter.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Could it be... the truth was never...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, the door's over here!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Agh—!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: How could... did someone spot us?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Stand back, Ifrit.
Calcification...!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria, you're awake! Hooray!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But you're...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You're not bluffing a doctor that easily.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm just holding this door until it's safe enough for you to leave. QED, I'm perfectly fine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The military mechs are closing in on our position.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: This path is no longer safe.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Director Jara...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She wouldn't hand over the information that easily.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And so, there is only one possibility remaining.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: ...Ten minutes.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: They should have run into Blake's people by now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The old Saria would have probably stood a chance to escape unscathed.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: However, she's injured and carrying two extra burdens. Want to guess how long she can last in front of a fully armed special forces unit?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Your phone is ringing, ma'am.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Of course. I'm always willing... to serve Columbia.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you for the advice.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: By now, you should be willing to believe me that I did try my best.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I tried my hardest just to secure this opportunity to talk. If you had agreed with me earlier, then our Defense Director's life would at the very least not be in danger.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: But you still sent them on that path... to that secret passage known only to Maylander agents.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Saria might die because of you, and the next one to go may well be the one you're most concerned about.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm hoping from the bottom of my heart that you think the question over.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Where the hell is Kristen Wright?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Director Jara... works for Maylander?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I investigated her ten years ago and found nothing. It was only when the Tin Man showed up and I left Rhine Lab that I got more clues to confirm it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She's been at Rhine for a long time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She knew Kristen even before I did.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ifrit, attack the window on your left.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Gotcha!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's so sturdy!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The glass in the experimental labs is all reinforced, so ordinary impacts aren't going to be able to smash them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And if we break them now, we'll attract the attention of the soldiers downstairs.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We can use my fire to cut through the glass.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I can control my flames already, so I'll be able to do it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (The teacher mentioned this in my Originium Arts classes... fire can be tempered, be silent, and become a quiet anger.)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Make my flames into a sword.)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Make my flames into a single thread——)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It cracked... a little bit!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: *cough*...*cough*...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You've split the enamel.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria, just hold on a little longer!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm halfway through, I can do it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Focus, Ifrit. Don't get distracted.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: When you were unconscious, Director Jara told me that there's no way you can fight against the entire country.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: So if it is as you say, that Maylander and the military have come to some kind of agreement, then we truly are facing off the entire country right now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Your heart rate and body temperature are spiking near their limits, and you've only just woken up. Your body is taking a serious toll.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Perhaps.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria, you're at your limit.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, Jara modified your drone. I've seen... the prototype blueprints.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: When did you...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Its current load-bearing capacity is at least two adults for a short distance glide.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Get out through the hole Ifrit opened, and the drone will be able to take you to the roof of the opposite building.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You'll have to act fast.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'll wait for you to go over, and then I'll exit through this door and divert the pursuers. Their numbers are many, and I won't be able to fend them off for long.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: ...Saria.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You still haven't given me an answer.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.text: Your inability to make a genuine stand against Rhine, is it because deep in your bones, you've always been the same as them...? The same as Control?

attributes.content: Sorry, Silence.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I thought it through, and I'm unable to give you a definite answer.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If Kristen's experiment violates any laws that shouldn't have been broken, I will stop her. Just like all the wrongs Rhine has committed over the years—the wrong should be made right.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: For I've always believed that the stronger one is, the less rash they should be acting.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But if I were to return to the past, back to when Kristen and I first met, when everything had yet to happen...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I would not have stopped the Kristen then. I would not have stopped the birth of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Yes, even if I knew that Rhine would create so much suffering in the future, even if I could foresee the ambitions of Kristen, Parvis and Ferdinand growing out of control...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I would still stand with them.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria... your answer might be even more definitive than you think.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, Saria! Did you guys see that? I opened it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Go, Silence.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If there's anything else you would like to know, we can wait until this is all over. And I'll tell you.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence? Silence?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why are you spacing out? We gotta get moving.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.text: 'Poor Liberi. None of this has anything to do with you.'
'What exactly is it that you want? Truth, justice, or peace?'
'I will tell you what you want to know.'
'And yet, even if you know it all, what can you do?'

attributes.content: This is not the answer I want.
No.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A drone's... belt?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Silence, what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The whirring of a drone starting up comes from behind.
The unreinforced door at the end of the corridor is about to melt under the impact of the energy weapon.
Saria is suspended in midair, holding Ifrit in one arm, stretching the other out towards Silence, trying to grab her.
But Silence doesn't return her grip, and retraces the path she's taken in reverse.
I should have talked with you sooner, Saria.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I only just came to understand why I can't help but get mad at you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I thought it was from the falling out we had during the 'Diαbolic Crisis.'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Or that I'm dissatisfied with the way you insist on shouldering everything yourself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But actually... the one I'm most annoyed with is myself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The blame I push onto you for not doing enough, it's only because... I built a habit of depending on you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I had hoped you could change Control, just like I once hoped the Professor could save Ifrit, and that Control could change Rhine Lab... I had hoped every deadlock would be solved by someone stronger.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm so weak, aren't I?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: On the one hand, I loathe the powerful figures that manipulate everything and treat innocent lives like expendable resources and numbers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: On the other hand, I still pin my hopes for the future on people stronger in not just power, but also morality and empathy.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Only now do I understand that no one can truly carry everything on their own, that it's beyond the capacity of a single individual.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Everyone who has been willing to help me on the way here, Rhodes Island, Director Muelsyse, Director Jara, and you...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: All of you want me to stay out of it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you hadn't collapsed in front of me, if Ifrit hadn't been in danger, I might have just obediently thrown in the towel.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But now—I won't back down.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I refuse to allow myself to stay under your wings. I refuse to accept that I can only stand in vain as the gunfire rings right above us and open my arms to the injured.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This time, I will step into the flames before any of you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The drone sends the two to a lower floor of the neighboring building. Saria smashes a window and they land smoothly.
There must be more of Ferdinand's people on the lookout downstairs, but as long as there's room for action, she believes she can find a way to break through the encirclement.
However...
Silence... what are you doing?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence, hurry up and fly over here with your drone!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit anxiously yells at the room across, but Silence takes a long look at them before turning her back.
Just as Silence begins to turn, Saria gets a look at her eyes.
They are brimming with regret.
But more than that, is determination.
Ferdinand, we've got someone in the corridor.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: She says she has business with you.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: ...Silence?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Why are you...?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Director Jara. I've already made up my mind. I have unfinished business, so I can't leave just yet.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I remember you, Parvis's stellar student. You and Elena gave me such a headache back at Site 359.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, my name is Silence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I would like to make a deal with you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A deal? Do you really think I would let Saria go?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This isn't up to you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: No, this is the only thing that's up to me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's... Transmitter, from Site 359.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What are you doing?! Even if you put the Transmitter into your body, it's not going to work, Dorothy's 'hub' was destroyed!
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The new 'hub' is in Kristen's hands.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's impossible. That was my experiment, mine and Dorothy's...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: A short while ago, I met Dr. Parvis. His laboratory was storing a large amount of Transmitter.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Clooney, you must have realized it long ago. You just don't want to admit it... You would rather believe your failure was owed to a bad move, than to believe that Control was playing you the whole time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did you really never consider the possibility?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She's the one that's working more closely with the military, she had countless ways to kill your experiment with Dorothy in its infancy—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: —But then why did she only show up after your experiment succeeded?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We still have a chance.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whatever Kristen is trying to do with Transmitter, she hasn't succeeded yet.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Clooney, bring me to her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The Transmitter is inside me. I'll become your beacon to locate Kristen.
attributes.name: Silence
